title: Review
description: JSON Schema for review modification request

$schema.description: path to the JSON Schema to use for the validation of the data structure

mId.description: Unique identifier of the review modification request

filmId.description: unique identifier of the film which the review modification request is related

reviewerId.description: unique identifier of the user who sent the review modfication request

deadline.description: The deadline by wich an answer is expected

status.description: Its true if the request is accepted, false if if the request is refused or null if the request is pending
